cause.description:
MALARIA FACTS:
- Malaria kills 1-3 million people annually. - Deaths predominantly occur in children under five years of age and pregnant women. - Approximately 90% of deaths occur in Africa. - 500 million people per year get malaria. When people are sick with malaria they have a hard time working and drag down their caregivers/family members. - People who die from malaria will never again have a birthday.
BIRTHDAY FACTS
- Almost all of us were born on a day. - Many of us get birthday cards from friends. - Many of us get birthday greetings and messages via the web and email. - It is a time of joy and love.
HAPPY BIRTHDAY NETS
- For your birthday ask your friends and family who would ordinarily buy you cards to buy a net instead. 100% of the funds donated here are used to buy a long lasting net for $5.
http://www.AgainstMalaria.com/HappyBirthday
- For those who send you egreetings etc. please ask them to join this cause.
100% of the money contributed on this page will be donated to buy a bednet, which can protect two people from malaria. (Please note that Causes takes approximately 4.5% as a fee - the 100% represents the % used to fight malaria that are donated to the actual cause. For more information on how the world swim foundation can do this please visit http://www.againstmalaria.com/en/FindOutMore.aspx and click 100% ).
